title: Demon's Cradle
description: Devany Miller is no longer just a forty-something mother of two. Sheâ€™s now a demon herself, one with powers that rival the one who first claimed her as his own. Now everyone wants a piece of her. Now she has friends she cares about and must protect in addition to her kids. Now she has enemies who want to rend her limb from limb. From the intriguing hyena man to the demon who is more human than he wants to admit, Devany has her heart and hands full as she juggles her compassion with her fierce need to defend those she loves.
author: Jen Ponce
